metadata.name: PowerElecLLM Expert-Verified Benchmark
metadata.description: Power electronics problems from verified academic/examination sources, categorized by difficulty

level_criteria.L1_beginner: Conceptual questions, device characteristics, basic identification
level_criteria.L2_intermediate: Standard converter calculations, firing angle, duty cycle, ripple
level_criteria.L3_advanced: Three-phase systems, THD, multi-stage converters, complex topologies
level_criteria.L4_expert: Control design, compensation, stability analysis, transfer functions
